A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: TLJ is an utter disgrace to the franchise. A true Star Wars fan will fully understand the wave of disappointment. Many other reviews have covered all the details. Basically Rian Johnson went out of his way to undo any and all the good J. J. Abrams tried to offer in TFA. To Rian's success he did exactly that\, completely gave an exit strategy for the Star Wars fandom.
